title: FURIOUS : VOICES OF BATTLE  PACK 2
description: Unleash the Vocal Fury With “FURIOUS: Voices Of Battle Pack 2”
longDescription:
Listen to all of the sounds in this watermarked demo:

CLICK HERE


Introducing “FURIOUS: Voices Of Battle Pack 2”, the ultimate vocal sound effects collection for game developers seeking intense, male-driven expressions that ignite combat scenes. With a range of anger emotions, this pack adds visceral realism to your games.


Pack Highlights:

The sounds of this pack has the characteristics of angst & anger, furious roars, thrill & excitement, and cruel laughs.


Folderized Sounds:


High Pitch: Piercing screams and fervent yells.

Median Pitch: Aggressive growls and forceful grunts.

Low Pitch: Brooding, ominous tones and menacing whispers


Use Cases:


AAA Titles: Elevate cinematic moments with authentic vocal reactions.

Action RPGs: Enhance boss battles and character confrontations.

Fighting Games: Infuse combos and special moves with fiery vocals.

Horror Games: Create spine-chilling encounters with cruel laughter.

Indie Projects: Add professional-grade audio to your passion project.
technicalDetails:
Features: 

Folder Names:-

High_Pitch

Median_Pitch

Low_Pitch


Number of Audio Waves: 172

Number of Audio Cues: 172

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 4:53

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
